titlestmt.titleproper: P. Scott Rubin list of rare United States coins auctioned since the 1850s, compiled 1980s
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: P. Scott Rubin list of rare United States coins auctioned since the 1850s, compiled 1980s
did.abstract: Notebooks containing a manuscript listing of auction records of rare United States coins that have appeared at auction since the 1850s.

daodesc.p: Part of a page from one of the notebooks

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Computer analyst and numismatic researcher P. Scott Rubin was born in Trenton, New Jersey. He maintains a large library that includes thousands of auction catalogs and is an active member of the Numismatic Bibliomania Society.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: P. Scott Rubin list of rare United States coins auctioned since the 1850s, compiled 1980s, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Notebooks containing a manuscript listing of auction records of rare United States coins that have appeared at auction since the 1850s. Listings are in the following categories: Half Cents, Large Cents, Small Cents, Nickels, Half Dimes, Dimes, Twenty Cents, Quarters, Half Dollars, Dollars, Trade Dollars, Gold Dollar, Quarter Eagle, Three Dollar Gold, Four Dollar Gold, Half Eagle, Eagle, Double Eagle. Entries give dealer, lot number, and sometimes price.
